::Orchestra/Decapitron/Legtrap/Headshot::

      Orchestra smiled and walke=
d beside Blacknightmare, hand in hand.  His knee and elbow plating were scr=
atched from skidding on the ground, and some of the rest of his armor was d=
amaged.  Orchestra had been standing near Darkfate when Unicron fired some =
missiles.  The explosion sent Orchestra flying back, and he sort of spirale=
d, and landed face first, then skidded a bit.  They were almost at the CR C=
hambers.
